DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine addition dexamethasone clomiphene citrate increase pregnancy rate intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Ovulation Induction With Clomiphene Citrate Dexamethasone
DOC.detailed_description: For decade clomiphene citrate ( CC ) first line therapy ovulation induction anovulatory oligoovulatory woman , superovulation woman unexplained infertility partner mild sperm abnormality . While approximately 80 % patient achieve ovulation CC , less half conceive . Pregnancy achieve approximately 10 % ovulatory cycle . Addition dexamethasone CC show result pregnancy rate 21-40 % CC-resistant woman ( defined patient fail ovulate CC alone ) . A subsequent randomized control trial demonstrate high pregnancy rate patient unexplained infertility undergo intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) CC + dexamethasone compare take CC alone . In light relatively high pregnancy rate achieve previous trial , hypothesize dexamethasone adjunct CC increase ovulation rate pregnancy rate appropriate candidate IU standard CC regimen . Our study design randomize patient undergo ovulation induction IUI two group : one consist standard CC regimen , consist CC regimen addition daily dexamethasone . The primary outcome measure pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: Active duty military member dependent seek infertility treatment Brooke Army Medical Center primary secondary infertility candidate intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) Severe male factor infertility ( total motile sperm count < 10 million/mL ) Bilateral fallopian tube obstruction Diminished ovarian reserve ( baseline follicle stimulate hormone > 20 ) History clomiphene resistance determine Clomid challenge test prior nonovulatory cycle take clomiphene Known suspect hypopituitarism hypothalamic amenorrhea Six prior therapeutic CC cycle without pregnancy Diabetes Renal impairment , hepatitis , hepatic cirrhosis , myasthenia gravis Osteoporosis Cataracts glaucoma Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia , Cushing 's disease , condition require chronic corticosteroid use
